snippet: The police said Boujeke Kenmoe, who was charged with second-degree murder, had also tried to kill himself.
abstract: Police charge Boujeke Kenmoe with second-degree murder in what is believed to be strangulation of his 8-year-old son, Jerry, in their Queens home; Boujeke had also slashed his own wrists in apparent suicide attempt.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: The police said Boujeke Kenmoe, who was charged with second-degree murder, had also tried to kill himself.

headline.main: Police Accuse Queens Man of Strangling His Son, 8
headline.print_headline: Police Accuse Queens Man of Strangling His Son, 8
